headers.onePassDesc: Local data storage, seed phrases and encryption make WAVES DEX reliable. However, we are going further. It’s time to switch on a new security level. Log into your accounts and switch between them by a couple of taps.
headers.onePassword: One password for all your accounts
headers.protectDesc: Set a single password for all your accounts
